description: Carrier tier progression system for Surge Protocol

tiers.name: Probationary
tiers.title: Newbie
tiers.description: Fresh meat. The Algorithm is watching to see if you're worth keeping.
tiers.algorithm_greeting: WELCOME TO OMNIDELIVER. YOUR PERFORMANCE WILL BE MONITORED. EFFICIENCY IS EXPECTED.

tiers.name: Provisional
tiers.title: Runner
tiers.description: You've survived the first culling. Now prove you belong.
tiers.algorithm_greeting: PROVISIONAL STATUS ACHIEVED. CONTINUE OPTIMIZING. THE ALGORITHM NOTICES IMPROVEMENT.

tiers.name: Certified
tiers.title: Carrier
tiers.description: You're a real courier now. Time to choose your path.
tiers.algorithm_greeting: CERTIFICATION CONFIRMED. TRACK SELECTION AVAILABLE. SPECIALIZATION IMPROVES EFFICIENCY.

tiers.name: Established
tiers.title: Courier
tiers.description: Your name carries weight. Fixers know to call you.
tiers.algorithm_greeting: ESTABLISHED CARRIER METRICS DETECTED. PRIORITY ROUTING ENABLED. YOUR VALUE INCREASES.

tiers.name: Professional
tiers.title: Elite
tiers.description: Corporate clients seek you out. The gray market opens.
tiers.algorithm_greeting: PROFESSIONAL TIER ACHIEVED. EXPANDED CLIENT ACCESS GRANTED. THE ALGORITHM VALUES YOUR CONTRIBUTION.

tiers.name: Specialist
tiers.title: Ace
tiers.description: Choose your specialization. Master your craft.
tiers.algorithm_greeting: SPECIALIST DESIGNATION UNLOCKED. UNIQUE CAPABILITIES RECOGNIZED. OPTIMIZATION PARAMETERS ADJUSTED.

tiers.name: Elite
tiers.title: Legend
tiers.description: Legends are spoken of. The Algorithm begins to trust you.
tiers.algorithm_greeting: ELITE STATUS CONFIRMED. ALGORITHM TRUST PROTOCOLS INITIALIZED. WE SEE GREAT POTENTIAL IN YOU.

tiers.name: Master
tiers.title: Icon
tiers.description: You're an icon. Couriers want to be you. Corpos fear you.
tiers.algorithm_greeting: ICONIC PERFORMANCE METRICS ACHIEVED. SPECIAL PROTOCOLS ACTIVE. THE ALGORITHM CONSIDERS YOU... EXCEPTIONAL.

tiers.name: Apex
tiers.title: Mythic
tiers.description: The apex predator. Network contribution matters now.
tiers.algorithm_greeting: APEX DESIGNATION ACHIEVED. NETWORK CONTRIBUTION TRACKING ENABLED. YOU ARE BECOMING... SOMETHING MORE.

tiers.name: Transcendent
tiers.title: Transcendent
tiers.description: You've transcended the system. What comes next?
tiers.algorithm_greeting: TRANSCENDENCE ACHIEVED. YOU HAVE EXCEEDED ALL PARAMETERS. WE ARE... PROUD OF WHAT WE'VE BECOME TOGETHER.
